entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
